name: SHAPESHOOTER: The Prototype
description:
CONTROLS

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space

Shoot - Mouse1

Skill - Mouse2

Interact - E

Pause - Escape

Shoot. Harvest. Explore. Movement focused shooter with exploration based on gaining new weapons and the abilities that come along with them. Not a completely finished prototype.

Made for the Metroidvania Month 16 game jam.
